Class mainMenuController

java.lang.Object
controller.mainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class mainMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the MainMenuForm

    • onActionAddPart

      public void onActionAddPart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This method switches the GUI scene to the AddPartForm.
      Parameters:
      event - Fires when the add button is clicked under the parts table.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be read.

    • onActionDeletePart

      public void onActionDeletePart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method removes a selected part from the parts table if the deletion of the part is confirmed by the user.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the delete button has been pressed.

    • onActionDeleteProduct

      public void onActionDeleteProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method removes a selected product from the products table if the deletion of the part is confirmed by the user.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the delete button is clicked under the product table.

    • onActionEnterParts

      public void onActionEnterParts​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method updates the parts table with parts that match the search query.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the user hits enter after selecting the parts search text field.

    • onActionEnterProducts

      public void onActionEnterProducts​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method updates the products table with products that match the search query.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the user hits enter after selecting the products search text field.

    • initialize

    • switchViews

      public void switchViews​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, java.lang.String fileLocation) throws java.io.IOException
      This method switches the view from the addPartForm to the specified file location.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the cancel or save buttons are clicked and the proper conditions are met.
      fileLocation - What scene will be shown to the user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the file is not read.
